message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $90. It's in great condition and worth every penny. Let me know if you're interested!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $75 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $75 is just a bit too low for me.  How about we split the difference and go with $77.50? I'm willing to be flexible to make this work.
Hello Alice, I've given your offer some thought and I'm still not comfortable at $77.50. Would you consider $76?
